\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
\& {\color{gray}\bullet} \& Q \&\& {\color{gray}\bullet} \\
D \&\& P \& {\color{gray}\bullet} \&\& {\color{gray}\bullet} \\
\&\& C \&\& B \\
\& \bullet
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,65;blue,255}, Rightarrow, from=1-3, to=2-3]
\arrow["{t_{1,3}}", color={rgb,255:red,235;green,173;blue,173}, curve={height=6pt}, Rightarrow, from=1-5, to=1-2]
\arrow["{t_2}", color={rgb,255:red,176;green,176;blue,176}, Rightarrow, from=1-5, to=2-4]
\arrow["{t_{1,2}}"', color={rgb,255:red,235;green,173;blue,173}, curve={height=-6pt}, Rightarrow, from=1-5, to=2-6]
\arrow["{\eta_{1,3}}", color={rgb,255:red,235;green,173;blue,173}, from=2-1, to=1-2]
\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-1, to=3-3]
\arrow["{s_{2,3}}", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,88}, curve={height=6pt}, Rightarrow, from=2-1, to=4-2]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,65;blue,255}, Rightarrow, from=2-3, to=2-1]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,65;blue,255}, Rightarrow, from=2-3, to=3-5]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,176;green,176;blue,176}, Rightarrow, from=2-4, to=1-2]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,176;green,176;blue,176}, Rightarrow, from=2-4, to=2-6]
\arrow["{\eta_2}", color={rgb,255:red,176;green,176;blue,176}, from=3-3, to=2-4]
\arrow["{s_2}", Rightarrow, from=3-3, to=4-2]
\arrow["{\eta_{1,2}}", color={rgb,255:red,235;green,173;blue,173}, from=3-5, to=2-6]
\arrow[Rightarrow, from=3-5, to=3-3]
\arrow["{s_{1,2}}"', color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,88}, curve={height=-6pt}, Rightarrow, from=3-5, to=4-2]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
